profile: For 20 years, Edmonton Fireplaces has been helping Edmontonians enjoy the beauty and comfort of natural wood, efficient gas, and stylish electric fireplaces. We’re fully certified by Wood Energy Technology Transfer (WETT), a non-profit training and education association dedicated to promoting the safe and effective use of wood burning fireplaces, and licensed gas fitters for gas units. What’s more, we’ve built a strong network of relationships with leading suppliers and name-brand fireplace manufacturers to bring our clients the best in wood, gas, and electric fireplaces. Offering a range of fireplaces and inserts from both Canadian and international manufacturers, we pride ourselves on providing best in standalone and insert fireplaces, and will be happy to find you the exact fireplace or accessory to fit your home’s individual needs. We also provide a complete suite of fireplace repair, maintenance, and inspection services, helping with residential renovations, commercial jobs, and new home construction. Locally owned and operated since 1996, Edmonton Fireplaces continues to help keep Edmonton cozy. Find out for yourself—contact us today!
name: Edmonton Fireplaces

profile:
Alberta Wholesale Fireplaces Ltd. supplies and installs a wide range of contemporary and traditional gas (subcontracted to licensed trade), wood fireplaces, and stoves. Serving both retail and new construction in greater Edmonton and Alberta. We will travel anywhere you need us to be. Our showroom showcases over 40 gas fireplaces, wood stoves,high efficiency wood fireplace,gas stove,linear gas fireplaces, contemporary gas fireplaces and electric fireplaces. Our professional and friendly sales staff are always keen to finding that perfect fireplace for your home while meeting your budget and timeline.


Let us bring your fireplace dreams to life - call us today for a free in home estimate at 780-437-9966 or visit our showroom at 5363 Gateway Blvd, Edmonton (Monday to Friday 8-4pm, Saturdays 10-2pm).

We also provide complete removal of your old wood fireplace or gas fireplace. We will reframe and drywall your new fireplace, install the gas line (subcontracted to licensed trade) and even add a quick disconnect for your natural gas BBQ. We can provide a quote for any stone work or fireplace mantel install.


Alberta Wholesale fireplaces will travel anywhere you need us to go. We have installed fireplaces across Alberta, Saskatchewan, and even in Hay River NWT. We will provide a W.E.T.T. certificate with any wood fireplace we install.


Steve Hallett the president of Alberta Wholesale Fireplaces has over 30 years experience and does all the site checks himself . This is a family ran company with wife Tammy working the office and accounting ,son Tyler helping with installs. Jodi Snow is the sales manager and has been with us for 7 years ,he has a great knowledge of the fireplace business and can answer any questions you have. Dylan Hamill is one of our installers and has numerous years of experience with installing gas and wood fireplaces.

PLEASE CALL US FOR YOUR FREE FIREPLACE QUOTE
